Html:
Hi Could you give me a code sample that i can used to toggle graph

for eg i have two graphs declared as 

 

//CODE

var ipG = new BidirectionalGraph<object, IEdge<object>>();

var wirelessG = new BidirectionalGraph<object, IEdge<object>>();

_graphToVisualize = wirelessG;

 

 

//XAML

<graphsharp:GraphLayout x:Name="graphLayout" Graph="{Binding ElementName=root,Path=GraphToVisualize}" LayoutAlgorithmType="LinLog" OverlapRemovalAlgorithmType="FSA" HighlightAlgorithmType="Simple" />

 

Now i have two buttons if i click 1 it should show wirelessG if i click the later it should show ipG. 

 

The graph comes out perfectly but it sows the pervious graph for a second after the transition to the new graph
I have the same when I switched to a different graph and the previous graph is still there.  Did you figure it out how to remove it?
